sourcesContent:
import React from 'react' import {CreateTask} from '../CreateTask' import { useDispatch } from 'react-redux' import { setIsOpen } from '../../redux/slices/isOpenSlice' import styles from './Modal.module.css' import closeIc from './img/close.svg' export const Modal = () => { const dispatch = useDispatch() return (
dispatch(setIsOpen(false))} className={styles.closeIc} src={closeIc} alt="Close Icon" />
) }
